activities: Haelan provides an online survey that is available in the EU only to members of the Global Pastors Network ("GPN").  GPN members may access the survey to help them identify areas where they would like to improve their health status, and then assists them in developing their own plan to address those areas.  The individually identifiable information is not shared with third parties, including GPN.  Data is used by Haelan to provide customer service and to conduct research on the Haelan products.  Data for research is aggregated so that no individually identifiable information is released in relation to the research conducted.
recoursemech: If a concern is not resolved in-house to the satisfaction of the participant, Haelan will refer that individual to the EU Data Protection Authorities ("DPAs") who will act as a mediator to resolve the issues.  Haelan has agreed to fully cooperate with the DPAs of their authorized agents in resolving any disputes.
